org.rcsb.mmtf.decoder

Class DecoderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rcsb.mmtf.decoder.DecoderUtils

  • public class DecoderUtils
extends Object
    A class of static functions to be used to aid decoding from StructureDataInterface to StructureAdapterInterface.
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley

      DecoderUtils()

      • generateBioAssembly

        public static void generateBioAssembly(StructureDataInterface dataApi,
                                       StructureAdapterInterface structInflator)
        Parses the bioassembly data and inputs it to the structure inflator
        Parameters:
        dataApi - the interface to the decoded data
        structInflator - the interface to put the data into the client object

      • addInterGroupBonds

        public static void addInterGroupBonds(StructureDataInterface dataApi,
                                      StructureAdapterInterface structInflator)
        Generate inter group bonds. Bond indices are specified within the whole structure and start at 0.
        Parameters:
        dataApi - the interface to the decoded data
        structInflator - the interface to put the data into the client object

      • addHeaderInfo

        public static void addHeaderInfo(StructureDataInterface dataApi,
                                 StructureAdapterInterface structInflator)
        Add ancilliary header information to the structure.
        Parameters:
        dataApi - the interface to the decoded data
        structInflator - the interface to put the data into the client object

        structInflator - the interface to put the data into the client object
